content.html: Oof, my new job only offers Windows or Mac machines. Is 2022 the year Samathy finally uses a Mac for the first time? Possibly. Taking suggestions/advice. What will I hate the least as a 24/7 Linux user ?
content.value:
Oof, my new job only offers Windows or Mac machines.

Is 2022 the year Samathy finally uses a Mac for the first time?
Possibly.

Taking suggestions/advice. What will I hate the least as a 24/7 Linux user ?
